Class DMSManager

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.proxy.ProxyManager<DMS>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.proxy.DeviceManager<DMS>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.dms.DMSManager
public class DMSManager extends DeviceManager<DMS>
A DMS manager is a container for SONAR DMS objects.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter
